[by:山涧深处]

[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:21.90]105 is the number that comes to my head
[00:26.27]When I think of all the years I wanna be with you
[00:30.78]Wake up every morning with you in my bed
[00:34.98]That's precisely what I plan to do
[00:37.73]
[00:38.38]And you know one of these days
[00:40.58]When I'll get my money right
[00:43.08]Buy you everything and show you
[00:45.08]All the finer things in life
[00:46.84]
[00:47.45]We'll forever be in love
[00:49.63]So there ain't no need to rush
[00:52.48]But one day I won't be able to ask you loud enough
[00:55.58]
[00:56.53]I'll say will you marry me
[01:04.07]I swear that I will mean it
[01:05.47]I'll say will you marry me
[01:14.68]Singing
[01:16.07]

[02:02.43]The more I look the more I find the reasons why

[02:10.13]

[02:37.00]I'll say will you marry me
[02:46.86]And if I lost everything

[02:51.18]Cause I have you girl I have you
[02:55.88]To get right down on bended knee

[03:02.84]The day when I say
